title: Mike Capuano
summary: Michael Everett Capuano (/ˌkæpjuˈɑːnoʊ/ KAP-ew-AH-noh; born January 9, 1952) is an American politician who served as a U.S. Representative from Massachusetts from 1999 to 2019. A Democrat, his district included the northern three-fourths of Boston, as well as parts of Cambridge, his hometown of Somerville, and other communities immediately north and south of Boston. Prior to being elected to Congress, he served as an Alderman and Mayor of Somerville.
